text: @realDonaldTrump Going to a school with a less than pleasant zip code doesn't kill people. Not having a plan for Coronavirus, on the other hand, kills nearly 150,000 people at this point. You are the biggest loser and weakest link. Tweeting isn't work you lazy FOOL.
